tweakmyclient.gui.title: Tweak My Client - Config - Version: %s (%s)
tweakmyclient.config.colorGuiStart.name: colorGuiStart
tweakmyclient.config.colorGuiStop.name: colorGuiStop
tweakmyclient.config.colorWaterOpen.name: colorWaterOpen
tweakmyclient.config.disableAttackEntity: Disable attacks on entities in the list.
tweakmyclient.config.disableClientBlockE: Disable block event rendering (eg pistons animations).
tweakmyclient.config.disableClientEntity:
Disable entity updates in the list on the client.
The priority of this setting is higher than the following: 
- disableClientEntityTNTUpdates
- disableClientEntityWitherUpdates
- disableClientEntityZombieVillagerUpdates

Disable TNT entity updates on the client.
Maybe useful for TNT related machines.

Disable wither entity updates on the client.
Maybe it's useful for fake peace.

Disable zombie villager entity updates on the client.
Maybe it's useful for fake peace.

Disable rendering of entities in the list.
The priority of this setting is higher than the following: 
- disableEntityTNTRendering
- disableEntityWitherRendering
- disableEntityZombieVillagerRendering

Disable TNT entity rendering on the client.
Maybe it's useful for fake peace.

Disable wither entity rendering on the client.
Maybe it's useful for fake peace.

Disable zombie villager entity rendering on the client.
Maybe it's useful for fake peace.
tweakmyclient.config.disableFovAffectedB: Disable speed multiplier effect fov transform.
tweakmyclient.config.disableGuiShadowLay: Disable gui shadow overlay rendering when gui is opening.
Disable items with enchanted glowing effects.
tweakmyclient.config.disableRenderBossBa:
Disable boss bar rendering when player is near boss.
You will gain a broader view.
tweakmyclient.config.disableRenderOverla:
Disable fire overlay rendering when player is on fire.
You will gain a broader view.

Disable frozen overlay rendering when player is stuck in powder snow.
You will gain a broader view.

Disable mask overlay rendering when player is wearing pumpkin.
You will gain a broader view.
tweakmyclient.config.disableRenderScoreb:
Disable Scoreboard rendering.
You will gain a broader view.
tweakmyclient.config.disableSlowdown.com: Cancels slowness effects caused by honey, soul sand and using items.
tweakmyclient.config.featureAutoClimb.co: When you are approaching the ladder / vine and raises your head, you will automatically climb.
tweakmyclient.config.featureAutoReconnec:
Automatically reconnects when you disconnect from the server.
Adaptive AuthMe, ReAuth and In-Game Account Switcher session validation.
Automatically respawns you whenever you die.
tweakmyclient.config.featureCustomWindow:
Enable window icon override.
You can define your own icons using the following resource pack namespace files:
tweakmyclient:icons/icon_16x16.png
tweakmyclient:icons/icon_32x32.png
Note: You must reload the resource pack to apply the file changes.
tweakmyclient.config.featureDaylightOver: Override the client's world time to the daytime you want.
tweakmyclient.config.featureLowHealthWar: When your health is too low, use action bar to send a warning message.
tweakmyclient.config.featureOpenWaterHel: Shows whether you are fishing in 'open water' and draws a box around the area used for the open water calculation.
tweakmyclient.config.featureUnfocusedCPU: Will not render anything when your Minecraft window is not focused.
tweakmyclient.config.autoDropInterval.co: How many ticks per interval to perform auto drop.
How many seconds to wait for auto reconnection.
tweakmyclient.config.daylightOverrideTim: The time set when overriding the client's world time.
tweakmyclient.config.enderPortalRenderMo:
If endPortalRendererFix is enabled, the ender portal renders in the specified mode.
The available modes are as follows:
Actual - Rendering the ender portal using its hit box.
Full - Rendering the ender portal as a full block.
Legacy - Rendering the ender portal with Minecraft 21w13a below.
Modern - Rendering the ender portal with Minecraft 21w13a and above.
tweakmyclient.config.getTargetBlockPosit:
Gets the position of the looking block.
This feature is used to get the position of the farthest block you point to.
Trigger threshold of low health warning.
tweakmyclient.config.memoryCleaner.name: memoryCleaner
tweakmyclient.config.openConfigGui.name: openConfigGui
tweakmyclient.config.openConfigGui.comme: A hotkey to open the in-game Config GUI.
tweakmyclient.config.syncInventory.name: syncInventory
tweakmyclient.config.syncInventory.comme: Try to send fake data to the server in order to get the correct player inventory data from the server.
tweakmyclient.config.syncBlocks.name: syncBlocks
tweakmyclient.config.syncBlocks.comment: Try to send mining abort packets to server in order to get the correct blocks data from the server.
tweakmyclient.config.targetBlockMaxTrace: Maximum line tracing distance of target block position.
tweakmyclient.config.targetBlockPosition: Position tracing format sent to public chat.

The block tracing position will be sent in this mode.
private - Only you can see
public - Send to public chat
tweakmyclient.config.listAutoDropBlackLi:
Auto drop item black list.
All items in this list won't be auto dropped.
tweakmyclient.config.listAutoDropWhiteLi:
Auto drop item white list.
All items in this list will be auto dropped.
tweakmyclient.config.listDisableAttackEn:
Disable attack entity list.
All entities in this list will not be attacked.
tweakmyclient.config.listDisableClientEn:
Disable client entity updates list.
All entities in this list will not be updated.

Disable client entity rendering list.
All entities in this list will not be rendered.
tweakmyclient.config.listItemGlowingBlac:
Disable items glowing list.
All items in this list will not be glowed.
tweakmyclient.config.disableLitematicaEa:
Disable easyPlace failure that annoying prompt window.
Note: Takes effect only when litematica is loaded.
tweakmyclient.config.endPortalRendererFi: Fixing the endPortal to only render materials at the top.
tweakmyclient.config.forceDebugInfoDetai: Always show full debug information, even if game rule reducedDebugInfo is true.
tweakmyclient.config.forcePistonWithoutA: The pickaxe will no longer be used as an effective mining tool for pistons.
tweakmyclient.config.debugMode.name: debugMode
tweakmyclient.config.displayDevelopmentO: Enable all options available in development mode only.
tweakmyclient.config.displayDisabledConf: Enable all options that do not pass the mod compatibility check.
tweakmyclient.config.displayUnSupportMin: Enable all options that do not pass the minecraft compatibility check.
tweakmyclient.message.globalEventListene: §e[GlobalEvent]§f: Ender Dragon Defeated at [x: %d, y: %d, z: %d]
§e[GlobalEvent]§f: End Portal Activated at  [x: %d, y: %d, z: %d]
